title: Mining/Experience table

properties.name: description
properties.value: This table shows all possible experience sources for Mining in the game, as well as all interactions that require a Mining level. It also lists the items involved in the interactions, as well as other skills involved in processing the item.

content:
This table shows all possible experience sources for Mining in the game, as well as all interactions that require a Mining level. It also lists the items involved in the interactions, as well as other skills involved in processing the item.
